website_summaries.verdict: While there are a lot of ingredients in this product, they all work to provide an all around improvement in your dog's health.
pros: Includes blueberries, flax seed, and spinach for added vitamins
Helps improve coat condition and overall senior dog health
Lower calorie content than food for younger dogs
Promotes heart health and a reduction in stool odor
cons: However, there are versions with sweet potato instead

customer_reviews.title: We call her a Labrador Anna Nicole.
customer_reviews.text: My girl is 11, in the left picture she was 100lbs and in the right she is 80. She had a few lifestyle changes (getting away from a family member who wouldn’t stop feeding her human food) but the food really helped her. She is still very active and peppy and her coat looks the best it has on a very long time. She didn’t have much trouble switching and does have a sensitive stomach. We had to split the food for a week, but after that, she’s been great. It’s been 7 months and she still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Made my senior dog extremely sick
customer_reviews.text: Gave my dog horrible diarrhea and gas that caused him to have accidents in the house. I think we received a bad bag of food because he’s been fine with this food in the past few months, but our most recent order caused him to be sick for almost two weeks. After this, I won’t be ordering dog food from amazon again. Rather than risk sickness and vet visits for my senior dog, I’ll shop locally to ensure the quality of my dog’s food. Having the food automatically ordered once a month was convenient but I’m extremely disappointed in the quality of kibble we received.
customer_reviews.author: TAV

customer_reviews.title: happiness, and her coat feels amazingly softer
customer_reviews.text: I have a ten year old dachshund and the moment of changing her to this food, she became her younger self again. I noticed increase in energy, happiness, and her coat feels amazingly softer. Diet is so important in senior dogs and this was really such a good switch for my fur baby. Would highly recommend this to anyone researching to find a good food for their senior dog
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great Wellness quality, but not grain free
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my older dog intending to switch her from Core. Unfortunately I did not do my homework on this one and didn't check on their site where it's pretty clear this isn't a grain free product. My dog really liked this food but within a few days of me introducing small amounts to her old food she began scratching a lot, just like years ago before I switched her to a grain fee Wellness formula. If your older dog has no problem with grains this is probably a good choice. If they do I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Our dog lost weight and is walking better
customer_reviews.text: Our pug mix has really stubby little legs and had gained up to 23 lbs. She is 10 years old. We trust the Wellness brand so decided to try the senior formula since it had lower calories. She loves the taste and over the last 8 months has lost 2 lbs. The vet is very pleased about that. She also has arthritis and was not able to complete her walk most days. Now she has moreenergy and can make it all the way around the block. We are very happy we feed her this.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce and Kathy O'Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Fountain of youth!!
customer_reviews.text: I started feeding my 11 yr old boxer this food and her arthritis and attitude improved immediately! I foolishly switched her to another food, thinking it may help her even more, but her arthritis again made it very difficult to get around, she was in pain and lost all desire to play. As soon as I switched her back to this, she again immediately improved. She is now 12, and has been running around as fast as her old legs will let her (and scaring mom!) and she is again bright eyed, happy and playful! I HIGHLY recommend this food for any age arthritic dog!!
customer_reviews.author: MsEarthDragon

customer_reviews.title: Riley Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My Miniature Schnauzer, Riley, has been on the Senior version for a little over a year now and eats like it's his last meal. Basically, the same as he has been eating his whole life. Never sticks his nose up like he is tired of it . Our Vet has always said good things about him during his physicals and is very healthy for almost 14 yrs old. Plays with our 4 yr old Cairn Terrier like he was still a puppy. Just not as long as he used to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wellness dog foods are great
customer_reviews.text: I only feed my Cairn Terrier one-half cup a day and he loves Wellness foods. When he was young I fed him another Wellness product, now that he is nearing 14 years he made the transition to Senior formula easily. He's a rescue boy with many rescue related issues since I adopted him 13years ago. His coat is beautiful and hard, and he still has the spirit of a terrier...even now.
customer_reviews.author: Muriel J Moore

customer_reviews.title: Always a hit at our house
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, as always! Our 10 year old boxer loves to lick the bag after we empty it into a food container.☺
customer_reviews.author: R. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Issues
customer_reviews.text: I have cancelled my auto subscription for the Wellness senior dry food because both of my dogs recently experienced diarrhea, vomiting and food aversions to this kibble. In my opinion the food has a foul smell. After years of using this brand of dog food, we will no longer be purchasing from Amazon due to suspected food quality control issues. We love our dogs too much to feed them questionable quality food and see them suffer. I would like to return the unopened bag and receive a refund for the current bag (two bags total) due to the hundreds of dollars in vet bills we’ve spent the last few weeks, but Amazon states this is ineligible for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Gray Lawry

customer_reviews.title: Always a great product / High cost
customer_reviews.text: Wellness continues to make a high quality product and gives my old dog more energy. However the price is very high and makes me consider buying other brands.
customer_reviews.author: CS Programmer

customer_reviews.title: Good Dog food
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs and one has allergies. this dog food is good but in one of my dogs it causes a food allergy. He starts to lick his paws constantly. This was also true with the Simple line of dog food. I have since changed their diet. You have to decide what is right for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: bjb

customer_reviews.title: Good food but bag sizes are not varied enough
customer_reviews.text: How about making a 10 pound bag instead of jumping from 5 to 15 pound sizes? 15 is too big to store, 5 is too small and expensive. A 10 pound bag would be just the ticket for two smallish dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: We also noticed that her weight was better managed as well
customer_reviews.text: Made a HUGE difference in our dog! We needed a boost of glucosamine and vitamins for our 8 year old pitty. This was what we needed. We also noticed that her weight was better managed as well. She loves the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Tumiel

customer_reviews.title: ... more than 2 years and it has been all good. However
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this item for my 2 dogs for more than 2 years and it has been all good. However, the manufacturer changed the packaging about 2 months ago. There is no longer a built-in zip-lock to keep the food fresh. I will have to switch to something else.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: My dog eats it everyday
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to like it, he is a 9 year old German Shepard mix, he weighs 70 pounds and is a health happy boy with a beautiful coat.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Transitioned to this dog food as recommended by the instructions. Gave my dogs very foul gas and diarrhea. Even after complete transition and weeks of feeding the dogs still have very large loose stools. Also, one dog doesn’t seem to like it. The other dog will eat anything.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Pierson

customer_reviews.title: 8 Y/O Pomeranian Loves this Formula
customer_reviews.text: My pomeranian is almost 8 years old and has been losing energy lately, I changed to this formula for seniors and she is completely different. Full of energy, eats a ton, loves this food. Was worried the pieces would be too big since my poms all get the small breed formula but she just eats one piece at a time and doesn't have an issue. If your dog is getting older, it is definitely very important to get a dog food that caters to that life stage.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Food
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Wellness brand for over 18 years. The nutrition it provides have helped our dogs have long and healthy lives. We have had an occasional bad bag but Wellness has always replaced the bag at no cost to us.
customer_reviews.author: bsdonovan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The food quality has gone severely downhill. Looks like it was caked in powder. Back was slit open, no where near a box seam. Canceled subscription because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara R.

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more on better food than vet bills
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs react well to it, reduced poop size and improved smell, compared to cheaper, less quality food.
customer_reviews.author: Quality review

customer_reviews.title: It's a great price too compared to retail stores
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old little 18 lb guy loves this stuff. He went through a phase when he turned 7 where he suddenly became a very picky eater. This was the only thing I could get him to eat at the time and he hasn't stopped eating it since. It's a great price too compared to retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: KeeperOfTheTrees

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has allergies and has been on this limited ingredient food for many years, i was paying $63 and some change by the time you added tax to the bag price per month. I added this to my subscribe and save, so add the discount plus the additional amazon mom discount of 20% and I'm paying less than $40 a bag. Now bear in mind Amazon has not quite figured out how to ship a 30# bag of food, so each month that has been an adventure, but only one bag came damaged enough to return and for the savings its worth helping them learn through this process.
customer_reviews.author: bflogal

customer_reviews.title: My dog often will leave a bowl of food out ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog often will leave a bowl of food out all day and just pick at it, even if it's grain free and organic. I ordered this on a whim and she loves it so much she eats her whole bowl as soon as I put it down and then asks for more. Will be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy I can find this sized bag for cheaper than ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I can find this sized bag for cheaper than my local stores, and having it delivered right to my front door. I used to have my senior dogs on wellness core diet and it was excellent but after bloodwork that came back saying that they need less protein and a diet appropriate for seniors I switched. All three of my dogs love it! They are active and healthy! I am grateful to have a food that they all like and is great quality. They have no problems digesting it and they all have great weights and coats...
customer_reviews.author: Rvincent

customer_reviews.title: This has been by far the best senior dog food for my little old man
customer_reviews.text: This has been by far the best senior dog food for my little old man. He has acid reflux and this is the only food he tolerates. I also appreciate that it is lower in k/cals than any other foods out there as well as a significant amount of glucosamine.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lapinski

customer_reviews.title: Good Dog Food.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs seem to like it. I have been having allergy issues so far this isn't helping. I might have to try something else
customer_reviews.author: DIANNA

customer_reviews.title: No longer a resealable bag
customer_reviews.text: My rescue dog has been eating this for 8 years. Very picky eater. Package bag has changed and it is no longer a resealable bag, so the human is a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Figs love it
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it. We have on auto ship so shipment arrives timely
customer_reviews.author: PAG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My nine year-old schnauzer has been eating this food for a few months now. I expected a big surge in energy and vitality after reading the tremendous amount of positive reviews, but I didn't notice a difference for several weeks...until now. He is clearly more playful, energetic and "present". I'm so glad we continued with the food.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Our senior dogs love this brand and it's actually helped alot with their ...
customer_reviews.text: Our senior dogs love this brand and it's actually helped alot with their allergies as well as weight control. I have enjoyed using this brand for all 3 of our dogs, however, this particular one is for our two senior doggies. Our youthful dog likes the Wellness Grain Free which has helped his weight, and kept his coat shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Dog Threw Away His Cane
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I switch dog foods I always worry about the effect it will have on the dog: e.g., won't eat it, or has a digestive issue. So, I kind of meld old and new for a while. Now the pooch (a nine year old Afghan) is totally on senior recipe and hasn't had either problem. ITs hard to say if the old age ingredients have had a positive effect, but he still has a field day racing around for long distances at full speed with younger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: G. Guth

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: I have always fed my dogs a high quality, not made in China, dry dog food. Since they are 13 and 15 now I wanted to try a dry food made for senior dogs. They are a toy and miniature, and missing some teeth so the smaller bites seems to make it easy for them to eat the food dry. I usually add water to soften up the food making it even easier for them to eat the food. They ate it from the first day I put it down for them, so they review was 'Excellent.'
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: I checked excellent for taste, however, I did not taste it.
customer_reviews.author: mschen

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog has a delicate tummy, but is otherwise in excellent health. He could never tolerate the big brands sold on Amazon, including this one (stinky). Hoped that this would have worked. We have to feed him a regional brand that has a lot more chicken in it and is not sold by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J. Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has eaten Wellness since he was about 1.5 yrs old. He's 10 now. He ate the large breed formulation for several years and we switched him to the senior food a few years ago. He seems to like it. His coat looks good and the vet is happy with his weight. it's a good deal on Amazon and nice to have it delivered to the house!
customer_reviews.author: jmm

customer_reviews.title: Delivery makes things easier
customer_reviews.text: I normally get this from Pet Supply Plus but after moving I am no longer near a pet store. It ended up being a few dollars more expensive but it was Prime so no cost to ship and showed up when it was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Reese loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this brand of dog food when my senior dog could not tolerate his previous dry dog food. I have this on autoship...I just wish I could have it come every 6 weeks instead of every 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 12 year old Westie appears to be more energetic and playful after switching to this food. She had been eating a mixture of Iams/Beneful. At the advice our of vet, we took out the Beneful and on our own decided to replace it with the Wellness brand. She did not have any problems with switching over to the new mixture.
customer_reviews.author: D. Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Switched to this product 6 months ago after getting great success with the cat and kitten food. My dog kept stealing the cats food so I bought her some of this brand to try and she loves it. She is 14 and has skin and allergy problems. Her coat is as thick and healthy as I have ever seen it. I highly recomment the cat and dog foods from Wellness.
customer_reviews.author: Openstory

customer_reviews.title: Wellness Natural dry food for senior - low in salt
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a heart condition and I was looking for a product that was low in salt. Wellness was the lowest one. Rosie loves the treats and the wet /dry food. It was no problem converting her to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it.
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe was that it is not available in smaller kibbles. They are really too big for really small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: The tin bender 12562

customer_reviews.title: Wellness dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog it’s it, but loves the wellness canned food with it ! :)
customer_reviews.author: White Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Decent brand for senior dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this brand from the referral of my veterinarian for my 10 year old Greyhound. He is on his 3rd bag now (about 1 bag per month). He doesn't seem to care for it any more than any other brand, but that seems to just be his personality. He seems energetic/lively (for a 10 year old greyhound anyway) and otherwise in pretty decent health. Gave it 5 stars because I don't really see any reason to rate it negatively. Seems like a decent brand of dog food for senior dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He got much better and I started feeding him Wellness again
customer_reviews.text: This food made my 11 yr old American Bulldog very ill. His stomach has been upset since he started eating it. I called his vet and she advised me to give him chicken and rice to clear up his diarrhea. He got much better and I started feeding him Wellness again. I was hoping he just picked up a stomach bug. That's when I discovered it WAS the food that was making him sick. I won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: D_Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this great product. My dog's been using it for years and loves it. Helps her coat too.
customer_reviews.author: Lucci

customer_reviews.title: Made dog ill
customer_reviews.text: Poor baby dog got sick with diarrhea and gas. Had to take him to the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Loki

customer_reviews.title: Poop and more poop
customer_reviews.text: My dog does love this food but compared to the food that he was eating before (same brand, different formula) he eats about 3x as much, and poops about 3x as much... it's hard to keep up with. While it's a good quality brand, and I will switch back to the previous formula, it seems as if he's not able to absorb the nutrients as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G. Perry

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to find a food with all senior supplements, vitamins, fruits and veggies, with no bad ingredients!! Dogs love it so no need to buy any extras to go in it, seems expensive but saves money in the long run. Did i mention it comes to the front door so you dont have to drag home a giant heavy bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dog lover 42

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are 12 yrs old and they like this foods
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are 12 yrs old and they like this foods. I aways buy it. Great Foods for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Woof
customer_reviews.text: Good food for our dogs. It's a bit more costly, but not only is it better ingredients, they eat less that they do of the cheaper, more "mainstream" brands. So really, the cost breaks down about the same. Buy the cheaper stuff; buy more. Buy this; buy less.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this food. The kibble is hard as a rock! My senior dog just can't chew this kibble and she has very good teeth! It is even difficult for me to break up. Have to use a hammer, then it just shatters into dust. Wish I didn't buy a 15# bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Food
customer_reviews.text: It is a little pricey, but you either spend the money on the food or at the vet. I have two dogs, 7 & 11. Their coats have become so shiny since using this food, even the vet commented on it when I took the 11 year old in for his yearly exam. I also use the subscribe and save plan, which is wonderful! I am 63 years old and have shoulder problems so having this delivered to the door is a great option since the shipping is free and I save 5%.
customer_reviews.author: Checola Snickers

customer_reviews.title: Arrives in great shape
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving my dogs Wellness for many years and I highly recommend the brand. I was concerned the food would arrive smashed up or in a ripped bag. It arrived in a rectangular cardboard box. The food was not smashed and the product was fresh--the expiration date was a long time away. I ordered a second bag and had the same experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen80

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Just tried this dog food on my eight year old dog. She loves it, and its lower in calories than the regular mix so a little healthier for senior dogs. Shipping was fast with Prime, but my postal-lady hates me when she has to deliver this heavy package.
customer_reviews.author: SFwood58

customer_reviews.title: My dog won't eat it.
customer_reviews.text: My seven-year-old dog will not touch this food. He has never been picky before, ever. Even when I mix in meat and oils, he is licking them off and leaving the dog food bits.
customer_reviews.author: amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Did not love this, after many years of using it with ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not love this, after many years of using it with another dog. Not sure if the recipe changed but the smell wasn't even the same, and my dog got an upset stomach. Disappointing since I always recommended Wellness products in the past. No more.
customer_reviews.author: B. Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My dog is getting old so I had to switch from the chicken adult blend this this senior blend. She still loves this just as much and it brought her back down to a healthier weight. She is happier and healthier. Any Wellness blend would be highly recommended by me - I actually do recommend Wellness to a lot of people in my life with dogs :)
customer_reviews.author: katee

customer_reviews.title: Been really satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: switched our senior to this a few years back when Innova went down the tubes. Been really satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C.

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food
customer_reviews.text: Mya going to be 14 soon. Bet can't believe how healthy. It's all about the food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Maineiac

customer_reviews.title: My flat coated retriever and my miniature dachshund don't like it. I won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Sorry! My flat coated retriever and my miniature dachshund don't like it. I won't buy again! Even when they're very hungry, they try to eat it' but walk away.
customer_reviews.author: lake girl

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog
customer_reviews.text: I have seen a change in my 9 year old pom's movements. He has arthritis in his hips and is very smart about when I'm trying to give him vitamins in treats. I love this dog food!
customer_reviews.author: Paiute

customer_reviews.title: best food at the best price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog at the best price we have found. All other foods make our dog somewhat sick.
customer_reviews.author: John Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good product; lousy Amazon packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Wellness is a quality product; however, Amazon packaging is poor. Do not order with other products especially small or easily damaged items as they may slip out of the partially unsealed carton or be damaged by the weight of the dog food sliding around in the carton
customer_reviews.author: B52Pilot

customer_reviews.title: For Senior Dogs
customer_reviews.text: We have two senior dogs, one that was having issues with a different brand of high quality food. The other brand does not offer a senior food so we had to switch. We found Wellness and there have been no issues since the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Michigander

customer_reviews.title: Good quality food for Senior dog
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. My 14 year old dog eats well. I also like antioxidants and glucosamine in it, so that I don't have to give tablets separately. He is fed a mix of 50% Wellness + 50% raw meat. His coat is thick and beautiful. His poop is little, assuming my dog is digesting well.
customer_reviews.author: dog lover

customer_reviews.title: Beware of moths....
customer_reviews.text: I generally love this item for my dog (and she loves it too), but this is the 2nd bag I've bought that has been infested with moths! I hate this because she loves it but I'll have move on to something else. Buyer beware of moth infestation. I thought we got moths and they infested her 1st bag but now that I bought a 2nd bag and they moths are already in there, I know it's the food and not us. How about some Quality Assurance Wellness? You're losing a long time customer for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Cabana Chives

customer_reviews.title: High quality food that helped my dog lose weight
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this food about two months ago and it's a perfect fit for my dog. He has a sensitive digestive system and I was looking for a corn- and wheat-free food. He also has joint issues (ACL surgery 6 months ago), and he's 13 years old. After two months eating this food, he has shed his excess weight almost effortlessly (although we've cut down on the treats a bit too). He loves the flavor and I've noticed that he has more energy. His coat is silky soft. I feel good feeding him this high quality food and hope that it will extend his life... forever.
customer_reviews.author: lucy jack

customer_reviews.title: Finicky eater likes this
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a finicky eater with a somewhat sensitive stomach. He eats this food with no problem, and after several bags has not gotten "tired" of it. I like the nutritional content and appreciate the availability of a senior blend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Good food/steep price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is good food but it's soooo expensive. Our vet recommended Purina One chicken and rice for our older dogs so we switched and pay half the price for a 30 lb bag. A real help to the budget!
customer_reviews.author: June Jagunic

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Our Scottie Girlie has several allergies and we tried many different kibbles and this one has been Wonderful. She likes the food and is growing hair where the hair had fallen out from the allergy. So we will be buying Wellness from now on.
customer_reviews.author: ilovemyscottiegirlie

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating this brand food for about 8 years. Just switched to senior. She likes it. Great % of protein. Awesome price on this 15 lb bag at Amazon; I pay about the same for the small bag at the brick and mortar stores.
customer_reviews.author: Oli J

customer_reviews.title: Wellness
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper and more convenient than the pet store. We have fed this to my 15 year old Aussie/BC mix dog for several years now.
customer_reviews.author: VitamanC

customer_reviews.title: Love Wellness!
customer_reviews.text: I have a little Pom who is 10 now but started on this when she was a puppy. It's important to get regular sized kibble like this instead of the kind sold for small dogs, because it keeps their teeth cleaner as she chews on it. We also love the Rewards treats!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Carson

customer_reviews.title: Healthy for Them
customer_reviews.text: I know it's good for her. On occasion she leaves some kernels behind, but she eats the majority. she is 11 years old we think and weighs about 80 pounds. Just trying to keep her around as long as we can.
customer_reviews.author: karmajane

customer_reviews.title: Great food!
customer_reviews.text: Since I started using this food my senior is acting like a puppy again! he has more energy, a healthier coat, and he actually likes the taste of the food. The size of the pieces are small enough for him to eat fairly easily, but if your dog is missing teeth they might have some trouble getting the food chewed up.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan O.

customer_reviews.title: woof woof
customer_reviews.text: this is the only senior food my dog likes, so 5 stars from penny 🐶
customer_reviews.author: Dankster Mcgriff

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes it, she is healthy, and the vet said it is one of the better brands of pet food. It arrived on time , well packaged, with an expiration date nearly a year in the future so it meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for food allergies.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a history of chronic ear infections. We have tried numerous, pricey, dry dog foods. Since starting her on this, she no longer scratches her ears and we have not had any ear infections. I wish we had found this much sooner! It is very much worth the money and her coat is also very smooth and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: als43

customer_reviews.title: Senior doing better on this food than other
customer_reviews.text: Have an advanced age senior pup who whad begun to move stiff and slow. After just about a week on this food, he began moving freely again, and now he's even playing!! He eats readily, coat & skin are great, no allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Joyous

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and plugged up my dog.
customer_reviews.text: Another bad, expensive dog food. Not only did my dog hate it but it plugged her up too.
customer_reviews.author: j.a.c

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this food for a 17 y/o Dachshund hoping to bring her energy levels up. Now all she does is sleep...nothing more. Going to switch back to the crazy expensive store-bought brand for now.
customer_reviews.author: Hen

customer_reviews.title: Helped irritable bowel in my dog
customer_reviews.text: My Jack Russel Terrier has always had irritable bowel issues from whatever food I tried. I did some research and found Wellness to be one of the trusted brands for actual nutritious products in their food instead of processed junk. I've noticed a lot less problems with my dog's digestion since switching.
customer_reviews.author: S. Subervielle

customer_reviews.title: Pleases my three old mutts
customer_reviews.text: My three elderly dogs are different sizes with different appetites and they all love this food.
customer_reviews.author: C&S LATOUR

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Poodle
customer_reviews.text: Product keeps my retired show dog now 9 looking like she is ready for the ring.
customer_reviews.author: sissy

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this food
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this food, especially since it's less expensive than the vet food. My dog eats it fine, but it makes her very gassy. In addition, she started to lose hair on back. The skin got very dry with big flakes. Since this has never happened I can only think it's the food.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: my dog doesn't like the food. I hoped this would help her, but she does like it.
customer_reviews.author: pclancey

customer_reviews.title: Trying this food since one week my dog has horrible gas and diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: Trying this food since one week my dog has horrible gas and diarrhea, doesn't work for us. Or is just this package bad? :(
customer_reviews.author: US

customer_reviews.title: Great, healthy dog food
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive, but you don't have to worry about your beloved pets eating junk. No meat byproducts, no fillers or grain. This is a great, healthy dogfood with just the right amount of protein and fat. And the dogs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa wendt

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: Love the dog food. My boys do very well on it. With the subscribe and save on this product. Although it has arrived with the bag being busted open from shipping. Shipping could improve with such large
customer_reviews.author: NHirschfelt

customer_reviews.title: My dogs like this which should be enough
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like this which should be enough, but this stuff is so healthy that the dogs "utilize" all of it. My dogs only eliminate once a day now, and I don't have to feed them quite as much. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: m2marsh

customer_reviews.title: Jack, cleans his bowl!
customer_reviews.text: My lab has reached the age and weight where he needs some dietary assist. I'd fed my dogs Wellness years ago, and thought Jack could benefit from a healthier dog food. So I've made the Wellness switch. After a month, his hips seem better.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda L. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Switch from Science Diet
customer_reviews.text: Wellness had been recommended by several pet owners, primarily because of the use of more natural ingredients versus more processed ingredients in Science Diet. My dog has made the transition from Science Diet to Wellness without any problems. Still too early to tell if this will have a positive impact on her health, but I could probably say that about the Science Diet even after all the years I have used it. I started buying Wellness through Amazon after my local pet chain store stopped carrying the Wellness we use in the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: handy2hmo

customer_reviews.title: Dogs aren't impressed
customer_reviews.text: My dogs don't want to eat this. I hoped they would like it but no matter how 'healthy' it may be, it doesn't matter if the dogs won't eat it. They let it sit for a couple days, and won't eat unless I mix it with canned food.
customer_reviews.author: janna wahlen

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed great for my senior olds English bulldogge but within two days he was puking and could not keep anything down, it made him so sick
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Dog happy factor # 10!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the wet and dry food from the Wellness brand. It must contain a lot of fiber because she goes more often after eating this stuff! Not a bad thing (for her)!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Two of my dogs couldn't stomach:(
customer_reviews.text: Made two out of three of my dogs sick:( Major tummy issues even though I slowly introduced it. I am bummed because I really wanted to use this brand but it just doesn't work with my dogs unfortunately .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: she had terrible reactions to it
customer_reviews.text: After transitioning my dog to this new food by mixing it with her old food, she had terrible reactions to it, including horrible smelling gas, diarrhea, and some vomiting. When I took her off it, the gas and diarrhea stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Sunchris

customer_reviews.title: Not able to get my pup to accept it
customer_reviews.text: Could not get my pal to eat it. Tried weaning over a month, but not a go! Sorry he rejected it. Had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lane

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We tried other brands, such as Nutro or Blue Buffalo for our dog Dana (12) and this is the only one she eats and likes. She is allergic to wheat and corn. Her coat looks great and is very shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Chatita

product_meta.title: Wellness Complete Health Natural Dry Senior Dog Food, Chicken & Barley
product_meta.description: Size:30lbWellness Complete Health Natural Dry Dog Food, Senior Health Recipe, is healthy, natural dog food for senior dogs made with carefully chosen, authentic ingredients for everyday health and provides whole-body nutritional support and promotes overall fitness and longevity, providing the optimal balance of nutrient-rich whole foods to fulfill the unique health needs of your aging dog. Wellness Complete Health Dry Dog Food supports your dog's healthy body weight maintenance, healthy body mass, overall health and vitality, optimal nutrient absorption, skin and coat health, hip and joint health and digestive health, all with natural and delicious ingredients to provide a guaranteed great taste that dogs love.
feature_bullets: ENJOY A LIFETIME OF WELLBEING: High quality proteins and wholesome grains are expertly balanced to deliver a complete diet packed with the nutrients your senior dog needs to thrive; no meat byproducts, fillers, or artificial preservatives

OPTIMAL ENERGY AND HEALTHY IMMUNE SYSTEMS: Antioxidant rich ingredients support strong immune systems, balanced nutrients promote optimal energy, Omega Fatty Acids ensure healthy skin and coat and beta carotene protects against cataracts and heart disease
WHOLE BODY HEALTH: Supported by omega fatty acids, antioxidants, glucosamine, probiotics and taurine for a healthy heart

FIND THE RIGHT FOOD: Wellness offers a full range of foods to support your dog's specific needs, including grained and grain free options, high protein recipes and limited ingredient diets for dogs with food sensitivities

Made in the USA using only the finest globally sourced ingredients, we prepare each of our diets in our own state of the art facility; we craft delicious natural recipes with wholesome, non GMO ingredients chosen for their nutritional benefits

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
